title: Is there a Twilight Saga Crossbreed book coming out? - Quora

response.answer_text: THERE IS NO SUCH THING AS TWILIGHT SAGA CROSSBREED. I wish I knew why this question keeps coming up in various forms here. First, “Crossbreed” was a fanmade YouTube video with zero ties to any official Twilight anything (see answer here: Cyndy Aleo's answer to When is "The Twilight Saga - Crossbreed" releasing?) Secondly, the term “crossbreed” is racist as all get-out so why on earth does anyone think Stephenie Meyer and/or a publisher and/or a movie producer would ever release anything with that name?
